page.title: 03Getting up on a school day
page.content: At 7.30 I get up but sometimes I get up a bit later. I have an alarm clock to wake me up, but most mornings I wake up before it rings, then I open my curtains and get dressed and brush my hair. I go downstairs for my breakfast; for breakfast I have different cereals like Start, Frosties, Rice Krispies, Cornflakes, Coco Pops or Weetabix. Then I have two pieces of toast and a cup of coffee. At 8.00 my dad takes my sister to the bus stop to catch the coach for school. I go upstairs to wash and clean my teeth with Macleans toothpaste. Then I go into my bedroom and make my bed which is quite easy because it is a quilt. Then I go downstairs and pack my bag for school.
